title: Rate of recidivism among sentenced prisoner 2006 - 2013 , by number of sentences
summary: Overall One sentence is gradually decreasing, Two sentences, Three to five sentences, and Six or more sentences are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of Rate of recidivism, in descending order is: 1. Six or more sentences, 2. Three to five sentences, 3. Two sentences, and lastly, 4. One sentence.
The minimum Rate of recidivism about 45.0, occured at 2008 by One sentence.
